subject: Roads and Traffic
Nascar Sprint Cup Series
Delays (Transportation)
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Track officials are dealing with the aftermath of a massive traffic jam that caused 15,000 fans to miss a Sprint Cup Nascar race.
snippet: Track officials are dealing with the aftermath of a massive traffic jam that caused 15,000 fans to miss a Sprint Cup Nascar race.
